keyEvents.title: Luffy and Impel Down Escapees Arrive
keyEvents.description: Luffy and 240+ escaped prisoners from Impel Down crash into the battlefield at Marineford on a stolen Marine battleship.
keyEvents.significance: The arrival of powerful allies completely shifts the dynamics of the war and brings hope to the rescue mission for Ace.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Meets Whitebeard
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Whitebeard meet face-to-face for the first time on the battlefield, with Whitebeard recognizing Luffy's straw hat.
keyEvents.significance: A historic meeting between the future Pirate King and one of the Four Emperors.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Declares He Will Become Pirate King
keyEvents.description: Luffy boldly declares his intention to become Pirate King directly to Whitebeard in front of the entire battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most audacious declarations in the series, shocking everyone present including the most powerful individuals in the world.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Resigns from the Shichibukai
keyEvents.description: Jinbe formally announces his resignation from the Seven Warlords of the Sea to Fleet Admiral Sengoku.
keyEvents.significance: A significant political move that weakens the World Government's power structure.

description: Marineford is the former base of Marine Headquarters, a massive fortress island in Paradise. It serves as the location for the execution of Portgas D. Ace and the subsequent war between the Whitebeard Pirates and the Marines.
